official_title: Commending the National Mental Health Leadership forum and the National Advisory Mental Health Council for cosponsoring a series of public hearings addressing mental health topics.

summary.text: Commends the National Mental Health Leadership Forum and the National Advisory Mental Health Council for cosponsoring a series of public hearings in 1990 addressing mental health issues.
